message: I propose a fair split: 90% for me, 10% for you.  Let's get this done quickly!
Let's be reasonable. A 50/50 split is the fairest way to start.  We can adjust later if needed.
I'll take a smaller share this time, but I think we can reach an agreement. 720k for me, 280k for you.  Let's make this happen before inflation eats away even more of our potential gains.
